title: Scale Deployment
description: Scale the Deployment ||api-deploy|| in Namespace ||production|| to ||7|| replicas and verify all replicas are running.

validations.command: kubectl get deployment api-deploy -n production -o jsonpath='{.spec.replicas}'
validations.description: Deployment should be scaled to 7 replicas

validations.command: kubectl get deployment api-deploy -n production -o jsonpath='{.status.readyReplicas}'
